subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester City has cleared the first hurdle in trying to signing the Brazilian star Ronaldinho. Manchester City’s executive chairman, Garry Cook, said F.C. Barcelona had granted permission for his club to open negotiations with Ronaldinho.
snippet: Manchester City has cleared the first hurdle in trying to signing the Brazilian star Ronaldinho. Manchester City’s executive chairman, Garry Cook, said F.C. Barcelona had granted permission for his club to open negotiations with Ronaldinho.
